Articles.Content:
Any mods out there for this? Something similar to mechjeb or half way to it would be ideal (add a navball & velocity indicators, automatically zero your velocity relative to target, etc).

Another possibility which I don't imagine exists yet would be to just have a rope/tube which supplies monoprop during EVA (similar to KAS) and can reel you back in, the catch being that it's limited in length.
The Void mod offers this if you have the info windows up then it'll show up when you go on EVA
I believe this HUD is available in EVA.
